definitions.definition: Pertaining to a current or recent time and style; not ancient.
examples: Our online interactive game is a modern approach to teaching about gum disease. Although it was built in the 1600s, the building still has a very modern look.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to the modern period (c.1800 to contemporary times), particularly in academic historiography .

main_definition: Pertaining to a current or recent time and style; not ancient.
secondary_definitions: ( history ) Pertaining to the modern period (c.1800 to contemporary times), particularly in academic historiography .
